languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс окончательно умолкает. Потом с мученическим видом закрывает глаза.{/n} "Цугцванг. Как в регициде. Любой дальнейший шаг... даже мысль... лишь ухудшает ситуацию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс окончательно умолкает. Потом с мученическим видом закрывает глаза.{/n} "Цугцванг. Как в регициде. Любой дальнейший шаг... даже мысль... лишь ухудшает ситуацию".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс окончательно умолкает. Потом с мученическим видом закрывает глаза.{/n} "Цугцванг. Как в регициде. Любой дальнейший шаг... даже мысль... лишь ухудшает ситуацию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."
{n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."
{n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."
{n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

languages.text: {n}海因里希终于陷入了沉默。他闭上了眼睛，露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“无路可走了，就像弑君棋一样。无论接下来怎么走……或者有什么样的想法……都只会让事情变得更糟糕。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希终于陷入了沉默。他闭上了眼睛，露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“无路可走了，就像弑君棋一样。无论接下来怎么走……或者有什么样的想法……都只会让事情变得更糟糕。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix por fin guarda silencio, con cara torturada.{/n} «Zugzwang. Como en el regicidio. Haga lo que haga... o piense... solo voy a empeorar las cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix por fin guarda silencio, con cara torturada.{/n} «Zugzwang. Como en el regicidio. Haga lo que haga... o piense... solo voy a empeorar las cosas».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはついに黙り込み、目を閉じて苦悶の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「レジサイドのツグツワンのようだ。どんな手を打とうとも…あるいは考えようとも…事態を悪化させるだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはついに黙り込み、目を閉じて苦悶の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「レジサイドのツグツワンのようだ。どんな手を打とうとも…あるいは考えようとも…事態を悪化させるだけだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tait puis ferme les yeux, une expression torturée sur le visage.{/n} « Zugzwang. Comme au régicide. Quel que soit mon prochain coup... ou ma prochaine pensée... la situation ne pourra qu'empirer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tait puis ferme les yeux, une expression torturée sur le visage.{/n} « Zugzwang. Comme au régicide. Quel que soit mon prochain coup... ou ma prochaine pensée... la situation ne pourra qu'empirer. »

languages.text: {n}Schließlich verstummt Heinrix und schließt dann mit gequältem Gesichtsausdruck seine Augen.{/n} "Zugzwang. Wie bei Königsmord. Egal welcher Schritt ... oder schon nur der Gedanke daran ... der nun folgt, wird die Situation nur weiter verschlimmern."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schließlich verstummt Heinrix und schließt dann mit gequältem Gesichtsausdruck seine Augen.{/n} "Zugzwang. Wie bei Königsmord. Egal welcher Schritt ... oder schon nur der Gedanke daran ... der nun folgt, wird die Situation nur weiter verschlimmern."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, en nihayetinde sessizliğe bürünüp ardından gözlerini kapatıyor. Yüzüne eziyet içindeymiş gibi bir ifade yayılıyor.{/n} "Zorunlu hamle... Kral katilindeki gibi işte. Ardından hangi hamle... Hatta hangi düşünce... Gelirse gelsin, her şeyi daha da kötüye götürür."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix finally falls silent, then closes his eyes, a tortured expression on his face.{/n} "Zugzwang. Like in regicide. Whatever move... or even thought... follows will only make matters worse."
